categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Grondarle was a Senior Commander in the Imperial Navy as of 0 ABY. Grondarle served as first officer aboard the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Chimaera under Captain Calo Drusan. When Lord Odo was aboard the Chimera, pretending to carry out a mission for the Empire, he inquired about the purpose of the mission.
